titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to convey the Saint Helena Island Light Station to the Great Lakes Lighthouse Keepers Association.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 4/18/1996--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to convey all right, title, and interest of the United States in the Saint Helena Island Station, Mackinac County, Moran Township, Michigan, to the Great Lakes Lighthouse Keepers Association. Subjects such conveyance to the condition that the station maintain its navigational functions.
